lessons.title: Introduction to Biology
lessons.description: Explore the basics of biology, the science of life.

pages.title: What is Biology?
pages.description: Learn about the scope and significance of biology.

contentComponents.text: Biology is the natural science that studies life and living organisms.

pages.title: Branches of Biology
pages.description: Understand the different branches of biology.

contentComponents.text: Biology has many branches, including botany, zoology, and microbiology.

pages.title: Tasks
pages.description: Test your knowledge with some questions.

questions.stem: What is the basic unit of life?
Which of these is a branch of biology?
Which organisms are studied in microbiology?

lessons.title: Basics of Physics
lessons.description: Dive into the world of physics and its fundamental principles.

pages.title: Introduction to Physics
pages.description: Discover the science that explains how the universe behaves.

contentComponents.text: Physics is the science of matter, energy, and the interactions between them.

pages.title: Key Concepts in Physics
pages.description: Learn about fundamental concepts like force, energy, and motion.

contentComponents.text: Force, energy, and motion are central to understanding the physical world.

pages.title: Tasks
pages.description: Evaluate your understanding with some physics questions.

questions.stem: What is the unit of force?
Who is known as the father of modern physics?
What is the speed of light in vacuum?
